name: submit_image_extraction
description: Submit comprehensive extraction of content from an image. Analyze and describe all aspects of the image including text, visuals, data, and meaning.

subject.description: What is this image about? The main subject, topic, or purpose of the image.

content_type.description: The primary type of content in this image.

text_content.description: All visible text extracted from the image. Include headers, labels, captions, body text, annotations, etc. Preserve structure where possible. Use [NO TEXT] if no readable text exists.

visual_description.description: Detailed description of visual elements: layout, composition, objects, people, scenes, illustrations, icons, and any non-text visual content.

colors_and_style.description: Description of color palette, visual style, design aesthetic, branding elements if any.

data_content.description: If the image contains charts, graphs, tables, or infographics - extract the actual data, values, labels, trends, and key insights. Use [NO DATA] if not applicable.

summary.description: A comprehensive 2-3 sentence summary capturing the key information and purpose of this image.
